 and an S-shaped spout on the right. There is a hinged lid

 flaring base. The body of the ewer is engraved with scrolling arabesque motifs.

sgcool_label_text:Because the Quran states that “we made everything alive from water” (surah 21:30)
 ewers carry great significance. Usually paired with a matching basin
 ewers are used by Muslims to wash their hands before prayer and many other acitivities. Because of their durability
 brass and bronze were commonly used to make ewers and other vessels to hold liquids.
